verbs.description: [V: Brushing] aside [ARG1: the anguished pleas of our NATO allies] , [ARG0: President Trump] Tuesday contemptuously trashed the Iranian nuclear deal and reimposed sanctions .

[ARGM-ADV: Brushing aside the anguished pleas of our NATO allies] , [ARG0: President Trump] [ARGM-TMP: Tuesday] [ARGM-MNR: contemptuously] [V: trashed] [ARG1: the Iranian nuclear deal] and reimposed sanctions .
